title: My Honor level just reset
body: I had just got honor level 1 back after a chat ban. Now it says it's checkpoint 0 of 3 to honor level 1. Why tf does it reset

replies.body:
Below Honour 2 your progress isn't meant to reset, but there was an error when the season rolled over: 
https://twitter.com/RiotSupport/status/1088580328489312256

> Hey all: We've found an error with Honor Resets for players below Honor level 2, leading to incorrect/bugged checkpoints. A fix is coming soon, within 48 hours. Don't worry; after we adjust things, you won't end up losing any progress during this time.

It seems perhaps it's taken longer than the 48 hours though. Player Support may be able to offer more info: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
